channel.title: Is there any plans to share dashboards access to specific users or groups?
channel.description: It would be highly beneficial to implement a flexible access control feature in the Redash, similar to the one in Metabase. This would allow to configure access to different dashboards for specific user groups, providing a more convenient and efficient way to manage dashboard permissions.
